name: Hardest 1.6 "Any Friend of Diane's" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who got a phone call in the cold opening of this episode?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla got a call from one of her kids that Serafina was having some trouble. We don't know exactly what the trouble was but Carla told the person on the phone, "Well cut her down". At this point in the series Carla had four children.

questions.text: What activity was Diane surprised Sam liked to do?
questions.explanation:
sailing.

	Diane told him she thought his idea of romance was "brunch and a cock fight". Sam always loved sailing.

questions.text: When Coach asked Norm how life was treating him, how did Norm reply?
questions.correct: Like it caught him in bed with his wife
questions.explanation:
Like it caught him in bed with his wife.

	Normisms such as this one have become a trademark of Norm's character. Whenever he entered he always said something witty.

questions.text: Why didn't Norm want to bring his boss to his house?
options: There was not enough beer there
questions.explanation:
His wife lived there.

	Norm was always making remarks about his wife Vera. Vera was never fully seen on the show but her voice was often heard.

questions.text: What was the name of Diane's friend?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca was a friend of Diane's from her college years. She was played by Julia Duffy.

questions.text: How did Diane's friend find out where Diane worked?
questions.explanation:
Diane's mother told her.

	Rebecca said that Diane's mother "took her head out of the oven long enough to answer". On a later episode we got to meet Diane's mother.

questions.text: What was wrong with Diane's friend?
questions.explanation:
She and Eliot had parted.

	They were having a good time when Rebecca started to cry a little. Diane asked what was wrong and Rebecca said that Diane always saw through her.

questions.text: What kind of man did Diane's friend say she was looking for?
questions.correct: One who spoke in one word sentences
questions.explanation:
One who spoke in one word sentences.

	This was how she becomes interested in Sam. When he talked to her, he only used one word sentences.

questions.text: What did Sam reply when Diane says, "Change"?
questions.explanation:
"Why, I like myself this way".

	Diane was actually giving Sam the change she went upstairs to get. Sam, being as smug as usual, gave this reply.

questions.text: Norm told Coach to hold him to one beer for the night. Later he wanted another beer; what did he tell Coach his boss wanted?
questions.explanation:
a pitcher of beer.

	Norm's favorite drink was beer. He drank it all the time. So when his boss said he wanted another one, he wanted one too. Coach, not wanting to let him down, refused to give him another beer so Norm had to outsmart him.
